# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_executable(unittester-ytlib)


target_compile_options(unittester-ytlib PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
)

target_include_directories(unittester-ytlib PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/sparsehash/src
)

target_link_libraries(unittester-ytlib PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  library-query-engine
  query-unittests-helpers
  library-query-row_comparer
  yt-yt-build
  yt-yt-core
  yt-core-test_framework
  yt-yt-ytlib
  contrib-libs-sparsehash
  cpp-http-server
)

target_allocator(unittester-ytlib
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(unittester-ytlib PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(unittester-ytlib PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/misc/test_connection.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/arrow_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/chunk_client_fetcher_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/chunk_fragment_read_controller_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/chunk_meta_cache_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/chunk_slice_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/downed_cell_tracker_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/encoding_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/erasure_parts_reader_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/job_resources_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/memory_usage_tracker_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/multi_reader_manager/multi_reader_manager_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/object_service_cache_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/parallel_reader_memory_manager_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/partitioner_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/permission_cache_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/replication_reader_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/row_merger_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/secondary_index_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/serialize_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/sorted_merging_reader_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/striped_erasure_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/tablet_request_batcher_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/transaction_helpers_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/protobuf_helpers_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/ytlib/unittests/ypath_ut.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-ytlib
  COMMAND
  unittester-ytlib
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-ytlib
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-ytlib
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

vcs_info(unittester-ytlib)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-ytlib
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
